subject: Patrick Ewing
object: 11× NBA All-Star (1986, 1988-1997) | All-NBA First Team (1990) | 6× All-NBA Second Team (1988, 1989, 1991-1993, 1997) | 3× NBA All-Defensive Second Team (1988, 1989, 1992) | NBA Rookie of the Year (1986) | NBA All-Rookie Team (1986) | NBA anniversary team (50th, 75th) | No. 33 retired by New York Knicks | NCAA champion (1984) | NCAA Final Four Most Outstanding Player (1984) | National college player of the year (1985) | 3× Consensus first-team All-American (1983-1985) | 2× Big East Player of the Year (1984, 1985) | 4× Big East Defensive Player of the Year (1982-1985) | 3× First-team All-Big East (1983-1985) | Second-team All-Big East (1982) | National high school player of the year (1981) | McDonald's All-American (1981) | 2× First-team | Parade | All-American (1980, 1981) | As coach | Big East Tournament champion (2021)
